name: Bad Luck Kitty
description:
You and your spouse are celebrating your first day of marriage.

However, a black cat is prowling the neighborhood and is intent on crossing your path and thus destroying your marriage.

Make it to the red flag each day by using the arrow keys on your keyboard before the cat can cross your path. Up is north, right is east, down is south, and left is west. If you fail, your spouse will love you a little less as represented by a heart disappearing. Fail four times and you will get divorced.

Also, bumping into the wrong flag will result in your spouse loving you less.

Keep the passion alive in your marriage as long as possible. Avoid that black cat!

Donations are nice, but not required. Thanks. :-)

Follow me on Twitter for more information: https://twitter.com/derekrumpler
